column1: The Pit Room////This is my first barbeque place I eat in Houston. It's really good
column2: some of the meat (I forgot the name) is really crunchy (the skin) and seasoned really well. The sides are really good too especially the corn. I recommend eating here when you come to Houston. The price is about $15-$20 if you wanna get the most out of it. The pies look really good but we didn't get any because we were full. We ordered the Feast (the one for 4-6 people).
